scheme_name: FAO Soil Classification by pH and EC
author: Sefy Levy
description: Combine pH and electrical conductivity (EC) to classify soils according to FAO guidelines
reference: FAO (2006). Guidelines for Soil Description (4th ed.). FAO, Rome.

classifications.name: ALKALINE, NON-SALINE
classifications.description: pH > 7.5, EC < 2 dS/m; potential micronutrient issues
